00030 #if defined(LIBC_SCCS) && !defined(lint)
00031 static char *rcsid = "$OpenBSD: strlcpy.c,v 1.5 2001/05/13 15:40:16 deraadt Exp $";
00032 #endif /* LIBC_SCCS and not lint */
00033 
00034 #include "ruby/missing.h"
00035 #include <sys/types.h>
00036 #include <string.h>
00037 
00038 /*
00039  * Copy src to string dst of size siz.  At most siz-1 characters
00040  * will be copied.  Always NUL terminates (unless siz == 0).
00041  * Returns strlen(src); if retval >= siz, truncation occurred.
00042  */
00043 size_t
00044 strlcpy(dst, src, siz)
00045         char *dst;
00046         const char *src;
00047         size_t siz;
00048 {
00049         register char *d = dst;
00050         register const char *s = src;
00051         register size_t n = siz;
00052 
00053         /* Copy as many bytes as will fit */
00054         if (n != 0 && --n != 0) {
00055                 do {
00056                         if ((*d++ = *s++) == 0)
00057                                 break;
00058                 } while (--n != 0);
00059         }
00060 
00061         /* Not enough room in dst, add NUL and traverse rest of src */
00062         if (n == 0) {
00063                 if (siz != 0)
00064                         *d = '\0';              /* NUL-terminate dst */
00065                 while (*s++)
00066                         ;
00067         }
00068 
00069         return(s - src - 1);    /* count does not include NUL */
00070 }
